CalcProcStepRelationship.name: CalcProcStepRelationship
CalcProcStepRelationship.description: Defines a parent-child relationship between two Expression Set Steps in an Expression Set Version. The label for this object is Expression Set Step Relationship.

CalcProcStepId.description: The ID of the child Expression Set Step.

CalcProcVersionId.description: The ID of the related Expression Set Version.

Name.description: The Expression Set Step Relationship name.

ParentCalcProcStepId.description: The ID of the parent Expression Set Step.

RelationshipType.description: The type of relationship between the parent and child steps.
